statements: SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocation;
SELECT category, amount FROM BudgetAllocation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocation WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT id, amount, spending_date FROM BudgetAllocation WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT spending_date, id, category FROM BudgetAllocation ORDER BY spending_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocation WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY spending_date DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM BudgetAllocation GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT id, category, amount, spending_date FROM BudgetAllocation WHERE amount > 1000 AND spending_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocation WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY amount ASC, spending_date DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM BudgetAllocation GROUP BY category HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation;
SELECT category, amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, amount, date FROM budget_allocation ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category, average_spend FROM spending_patterns WHERE frequency > 5;
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation WHERE category = 'Entertainment';
SELECT category, amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM budget_allocation GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, average_spend FROM spending_patterns WHERE frequency > 5;
SELECT * FROM BudgetAllocation WHERE budget_id = 1;
SELECT department_name, manager_name, location FROM Department ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT SUM(allocated_amount) AS total_allocated_amount FROM BudgetAllocation;
SELECT department_id, MAX(spent_amount) AS max_spent_amount FROM BudgetAllocation GROUP BY department_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM SpendingHistory WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT budget_id, allocated_amount, spent_amount FROM BudgetAllocation WHERE budget_id = 123 ORDER BY allocated_amount ASC
SELECT department_name, manager_name FROM Department WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY department_name DESC
SELECT department_id, SUM(allocated_amount) as total_allocation FROM BudgetAllocation GROUP BY department_id
SELECT budget_id, department_id, spent_amount FROM BudgetAllocation WHERE spent_amount > allocated_amount ORDER BY department_id
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM SpendingHistory WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_spending ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT category, amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE allocated_amount > 1000;
SELECT category, trend FROM spending_trends WHERE average_amount < 500 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, category, allocated_amount FROM allocation_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT * FROM historical_spending ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT category, amount FROM historical_spending WHERE amount > 1000 AND category = 'Groceries';
SELECT category, allocated_amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE allocated_amount < 5000 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM spending_trends WHERE trend LIKE '%Increase%';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_spending FROM historical_spending WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM spending_patterns ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category, amount FROM historical_spending WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM budget_analysis;
SELECT category, analysis_result FROM allocation_analysis WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM spending_patterns GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT category, analysis_result FROM budget_analysis WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM historical_spending WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY amount ASC, date DESC;
SELECT category, recommendation FROM allocation_analysis WHERE date > '2022-07-01' AND recommendation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY category ASC;
